```{r setup}
library(saaas)
```

## Detasets
```{r}
catch <- "catch.csv"
catch %>%
  system.file("extdata", ., package = "saaas") %>%
  read.csv() %>%
  plot(type = "l")
```

## Assessment
```{r}
catch %>%
  system.file("extdata", ., package = "saaas") %>%
  read.csv() %>%
  calculate(coef = 2) %>%
  plot(type = "l")
```
